gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate
Class PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.creation.PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl
      gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate.PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl

public class PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl
extends gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.creation.PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl

Implementation of PersistenceWorkerFactory. This implementation searches to find the appropriate implementation type of PersistenceWorker for each PersistentObject type in a mappings file. If no mapping is found in this file for a specified subclass of PersistentObject, then the factory will automatically create a GenericHibernatePersistenceWorker for this type, provided that the property Hibernate is set to true in the deployment.properties file.
In the case that a GenericHibernatePersistenceWorker is created, the factory uses the utility class Validators searching for a registered validator of the persistent class. If there is a validator registered for the persistent class, then it is passed as a parameter to the constructor of the GenericHibernatePersistenceWorker.
